title: The Wolf Who Hatched an Egg
description: [Siren Classic Erotic Alternative Paranormal Romance, M/M, werewolves, shape-shifters, sex toys] Snack or sweetheart? Definitely sweetheart. Or so werewolf Liam thinks when he meets swan shifter Shiloh. Shiloh is everything Liam's soul yearns for, a gorgeous, feisty spitfire who turns his blood into flame and makes his entire being sing. But Shiloh is reluctant to believe in Liam's good intentions. Shiloh has been searching for The One for as long as he can remember. In his quest, he made several mistakes, and now he is reluctant to believe again, especially in a wolf. After all, wolves prey on his kind. How could he possibly entrust his heart to one? As they struggle through misunderstandings and try to build a relationships, a third member joins their little familyâ€”a mysterious swan egg abandoned in front of their door. Will it strengthen Shiloh's bond with Liam or will it separate them forever? ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Scarlet Hyacinth
